item.description:
Did you know that The Bell in Hand is the oldest tavern?  Come down and step into history (yes, Tonya, I stole your line) for yet another TRIVIA NIGHT!  It's NOT Stump! trivia but the format is very fun and interactive. Trivia starts at 8:00pm on the side of the tavern with the stage (larger side). Last time, Team "Sandusky Shower Buddies" AND Team "$50 Apps" won first and second place, respectively. With all the combined gift certificates, I will be ordering appetizers for the entire group right at the beginning. So, bring your appetites!!

Limit is 6 to a team so we'll break up into however many teams, as needed. Please do suggest names. I should be there by about 7:30pm at the latest.

REMEMBER that you are responsible for your own food and drinks. PLEASE PAY AS YOU GO OR MAINTAIN YOUR OWN SEPARATE TAB. This event is cross-listed with Social Fun.

The Bell in Hand is conveniently located in the Haymarket area on the Green and Orange Lines.

Hope to see you there!
item.name: Trivia Night at the Bell in Hand Tavern
